data.comment: The match is underway at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
Shaquille Pinas (Den Haag) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 24, Bryan Smeets (Sparta) has received a yellow card from Kevin Blom.
Sparta take a 1-0 lead thanks to Lennart Thy.
Dirk Abels instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
The away team have replaced Ravel Morrison with David Lennart Philipp. This is the first substitution made today by Ruud Brood.
In the minute 53, Goal! Sparta increase their lead to 2-0 through a well-placed header from Sven Mijnans.
Great play from Mica Pinto to set up the goal.
Goal! Abdou Harroui extends Sparta's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 56, Bryan Smeets with an assist there.
Great finish from Lennart Thy to give Sparta a 4-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Deroy Duarte.
In the minute 68, Abdou Harroui, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Laros Duarte is the substitute for Sparta.
Henk Fraser is making the team's second substitution at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel with Aaron Meijers replacing Mica Pinto.
Den Haag make their second substitution with Pascu replacing Ilay Elmkies.
In the minute 72, Ruud Brood (Den Haag) is making a third substitution, with Jonas Arweiler replacing Nikos Karelis.
Amar Catic is replacing Vicente Besuijen for Den Haag at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
Danzell Gravenberch is on a sub for Bryan Smeets for Sparta.
In the minute 73, Henk Fraser is making the team's fourth substitution at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel with Mario Engels replacing Lennart Thy.
Pascu (Den Haag) has received a first yellow card.
Tom Beugelsdijk is replacing Michael Heylen for Sparta at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
In the minute 80, Mario Engels puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 5-0.
Aaron Meijers with an assist there.
Goal! Sparta extend their lead to 6-0 through Mario Engels.
That's full-time at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel. The final score is 6-0.
